title: "Library" Script
content:
I'm certain this is hand-lettered, but I'm hoping someone can guide me to a script similar to this! Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415000753im_/http:/typophile.com/files/b9dca13d214844098302fae98243748d_5248.jpg)
author: jvankriedt

comments.content:
